short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show default card count above each list, and show a total card count in the board header.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Need to see the card count above each list?
Need to see the total card of the board?
Don't want the total card count to break when changing boards?
Don't want the total card count to stop counting after adding/removing a list?

Well good news!
This is the extension for you.

My vision was to create a simple Trello card counter, that just simply works.
Many alternative extensions either offended the eyes or fail to keep track of changes that occur. For this reason I created this extension to solve these woes and improve productivity.
